mapper.sql: select p.owner_id, p.owner_no, p.user_id, p.community_id, u.user_name, u.phonenumber, p.tag_id, p.del_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark, u.is_owner, u.avatar, u.nick_name, u.status, u.nick_name as real_name, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(sub_ep.building_name, '号楼', sub_ep.room_number) ORDER BY sub_ep.building_name, sub_ep.room_number SEPARATOR ', ') FROM sys_estate_user_property sub_eup JOIN sys_estate_property sub_ep ON sub_eup.property_id = sub_ep.property_id WHERE sub_eup.owner_no = p.owner_no AND sub_eup.del_flag = '0' AND (sub_ep.del_flag = '0' OR sub_ep.del_flag IS NULL) ) as merged_properties, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(ep.area), 0) FROM sys_estate_user_property eup JOIN sys_estate_property ep ON eup.property_id = ep.property_id WHERE eup.owner_no = p.owner_no AND eup.del_flag = '0' AND (ep.del_flag = '0' OR ep.del_flag IS NULL) ) as property_area from sys_owner_profile p left join sys_user u on p.user_id = u.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT MAX(p.owner_id) as owner_id, p.user_id, p.community_id,
MAX(u.nick_name) as real_name, MAX(p.phonenumber) as phonenumber, MAX(p.user_name) as user_name, MAX(p.tag_id) as tag_id,
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(sub_ep.building_name, '号楼', sub_ep.room_number) ORDER BY sub_ep.building_name, sub_ep.room_number SEPARATOR ', ') FROM sys_estate_user_property sub_eup JOIN sys_estate_property sub_ep ON sub_eup.property_id = sub_ep.property_id WHERE sub_eup.owner_no = MAX(p.owner_no) AND sub_eup.del_flag = '0' AND (sub_ep.del_flag = '0' OR sub_ep.del_flag IS NULL)) as merged_properties,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_estate_user_property sub_eup WHERE sub_eup.owner_no = MAX(p.owner_no) AND sub_eup.del_flag = '0') as property_count,
MAX(p.del_flag) as del_flag, MAX(p.create_by) as create_by, MAX(p.create_time) as create_time, MAX(p.update_by) as update_by, MAX(p.update_time) as update_time, MAX(p.remark) as remark,
MAX(u.is_owner) as is_owner, MAX(u.avatar) as avatar, MAX(u.nick_name) as nick_name, COALESCE(MAX(u.status), '2') as status,
(SELECT COALESCE(SUM(sub_ep.area), 0) FROM sys_estate_user_property sub_eup JOIN sys_estate_property sub_ep ON sub_eup.property_id = sub_ep.property_id WHERE sub_eup.owner_no = MAX(p.owner_no) AND sub_eup.del_flag = '0' AND (sub_ep.del_flag = '0' OR sub_ep.del_flag IS NULL)) as property_area
FROM sys_owner_profile p LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id
AND u.nick_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND (p.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%') OR u.phonenumber like concat('%', #{phonenumber}, '%'))
AND p.tag_id = #{tagId}
GROUP BY u.nick_name, p.community_id, p.user_id
HAVING 1=1
AND property_count = 1
AND property_count > 1
ORDER BY MAX(p.owner_id) DESC
